title: Sin vs Dire Wolves: junglers clash

replies.body:
I hate when pro players bring SoloQ ranks into it... or say another pro player is just "bad"

They wouldn't be a professional player if they were bad.. and who cares about his SoloQ Rank?
**Childish...**

It's an act. They don't entirely mean what they say.

>>professional player
>>oce
lol
IKR lol. LCS won't even recruit here...
Professional LoL is a form of entertainment, chances are these players were told what to say or to give something along the lines to make the match spicy and attract more viewers.
